ComicInfo.Title: The Stone Age; Cracked Interviews the Newspaper King; One Day in Metropolitis; Misleading Movie and TV Titles; How Is It That...?; The Cracked Fix-It Yourself Manual; You Know You're a Real Monster If...; Increasing Consumption in Order to Maintain Full Employment; The Cracked Guide to Kite Flying; One Evening in a Fancy Restaurant; Signs That It's a Computer Age; Past, Present and Future Changes in Sports; Returns of the Jed Eye
ComicInfo.Summary: Crackedman tries to change into his costume inside a telephone booth but is arrested for indecent exposure.
